description: Unique identifier for the fuel import field definition; used to reference and order fields in import mappings.
Human-readable label describing the import field’s business meaning, shown in mapping tools and reports.
Boolean flag indicating the field definition is retired and should be excluded from new imports or mappings, retained only for historical compatibility.
Boolean flag specifying whether system validation rules should be enforced for this field during import (e.g., required, format, range checks).
Identifier referencing the field’s data type, which determines parsing, storage, and validation behavior (such as text, numeric, or date/time).
